bibl.title: Nobadian and Makurian Church Architecture. Qasr el-Wizz, a Case Study.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Functional parts of Byzantine churches. - George T. Scanlon's view of the development of the Qasr el-Wizz church. - New interpretation of the architectual changes in the church at Qasr el-Wizz. - Analysis. - Discussion. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Artur Obłuski, Nobadian and Makurian Church Architecture. Qasr el-Wizz, a Case Study.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 481-512, 15 figg.

Functional parts of Byzantine churches. - George T. Scanlon's view of the development of the Qasr el-Wizz church. - New interpretation of the architectual changes in the church at Qasr el-Wizz. - Analysis. - Discussion. - Conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
